attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ethnic minority employment laws need to be abolished, this is blatant racism and discrimination, people who are qualified enough to do the job are discriminated against when someone of a different skin colour or race is hired to just to fill a quota. 

Everyone in the UK need to be treated as equals by the government and employers. 

If someone has the skill to do the job they should be hired, it shouldn't be based on race or religion, i feel deeply offended whenever i have to fill out an Ethnic minority form, im White and Welsh but why should I be asked this when i go to a job interview? why does it matter? 

If you don't like this obvious racism then please sign this petition. 

Thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
